steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-user-avatar)`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-menu-my-account-button)` appears
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-menu-my-account-button)`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/my-account`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-surgeon-profile`

scenarios.title: check sidebar data

steps.value: !-- The steps below require working backend
When I change context to element located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-profile-personal-info']/h2)`
Then text `${surgeon-title} ${surgeon-firstname} ${surgeon-lastname}` exists
When I change context to element located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-profile-personal-info']/p)`
Then text `${surgeon-role}, ${surgeon-specialty}` exists
When I change context to element located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-profile-contact-info']/p[1])`
When I save text of context element to ((SCENARIO)) variable `phoneNumber`
Then `#{replaceAllByRegExp([\s-], , ${phoneNumber})}` is ((=)) `${surgeon-phone}`
When I change context to element located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-profile-contact-info']/p[2])`
Then text `${surgeon-email}` exists
When I change context to element located `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-profile-hospitals']/p)`
Then text `${surgeon-hospitals}` exists
